channel.title: How can i make ice barrage hit lower
channel.description: make my ice barrage hit lower for pking atm it hits 63s i want it to hit 20-33 any body got some ideas please and thank u i am using laxiscape source

item.title: How can i make ice barrage hit lower
item.dc:creator: @system system

item.title: How can i make ice barrage hit lower
item.dc:creator: @Joe_w000 Joe w000
item.description:
@Joe_w000 wrote:

Open up client.Java Search for

Ice barrage you’ll see something like this :

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= -124 && playerLevel[3] >= 1)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true))
{
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40);
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60);
startAnimation(1979);
attackNPCSWithin(369, 39, 0);
//hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(67); <----Change this to 25.
server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex);
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
sendMessage(“You poison and freeze the enemy!”);
//stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell.”);
}[br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2007, 09:15:52 AM[/size][hr]And it’ll be there a second time. Do the same.

Read full topic
